name: TrivialPursuitFamilyEdition
0:
”Alexa, open Trivial Pursuit Family Edition”
”Alexa, launch Trivial Pursuit Family Edition”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trivial pursuit family edition
des:
Welcome to Trivial Pursuit Family Edition by Hasbro, the game where kids and grown-ups get to test their trivia knowledge together.

Compete with friends to answer questions from one of six different categories. A correct answer allows you to try to answer an additional bonus question. Win the game by correctly answering one question each from all six categories and a final challenge question!

Say 'Alexa, help' if you ever get lost.

If you'd like to start over, you can say 'Alexa, start over.'

If you didn't catch something, you can say 'Alexa, repeat.'
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
